testcase.classname: Verifying the adactin hotel login details
testcase.name: Verifying the adactin hotel login details with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the adactin login page.....................................passed When User should enter "uvaishjj" and "MCM9J3"..............................passed And User should enter the Room Details"Sydney","Hotel Creek","Standard","2 - Two","17/12/2020","18/12/2020","2 - Two"and"2 - Two".passed And user should click the search button.....................................passed And user should select the room by clicking radio button and click continue.passed And user should enter the payment details"mohammed","uvaish","madurai"......passed And user should click the book now button...................................passed And get order id in console.................................................passed Then user should click the my itenerary button..............................passed
